About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

Hello, I'm Oguzhan Bilce! Currently, I am staying on the European side of Istanbul. I graduated from a 4-year industrial engineering program at a university in Thrace. Later, due to my interest in software, I shifted to the field of web development. After extensive training and reading various documents, I was ready. I developed my own simple projects using technologies such as HTML, CSS, JS, and React. I continue to use resources like MDN Web Docs, W3Schools, Stackoverflow, Udemy to improve myself because, no matter how experienced you are, learning should always be a habit.
Later on, I began developing more comprehensive projects, striving to do my best in each one. You can check out my Linkedin and Github accounts.
